attributes.action: Defending the Falklands and protecting the kelpers citizens from Argentinian Agression
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Strategic South Atlantic Falklands Islands are now on the verge of being attacked again by Argentinian Army Forces because Argentina doesn´t want the UK to explore and to extract oil from British South Atlantic Islands Sea. The British Army Forces have to be ready to defend the Falklands Islands and to protect British Citizens from more attacks. The Kelpers, who live and work in the Falklands, deserve to be protected by the UK and to be respected on their British Citizenship Rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
